description.narrative: Funding under this investment supports the implementation of the "Strategy for Australia's Aid Investments in Education 2015-2020". Education Analytics Service will provide specialist technical expertise to progress a program of analytical work and professional learning, and respond to demand for additional technical assistance as it arises. The Education Analytics Service will improve the extent and quality of evidence and expertise used by DFAT to inform its education policy and programs. To this end, it will contribute to: (a) evidence based policy formulation and advocacy; (b) design and delivery of effective education investments; and enhanced staff capability. The Education Analytics Service will contribute to these ends by providing high quality, timely, evidence-based; (a) analysis and research; (b) learning and development products and services; (c) technical advice; and (d) knowledge management services. The total value of this investment is $2.4 million over 4 years, startin
